verse.lines: {lang-eng}Behold the throne of grace! The promise calls me near: there Jesus shows a smiling face, and waits to answer prayer.{/lang-eng}

verse.lines: {lang-eng}That rich atoning blood, which sprinkled round we see, provides for those who come to God an all prevailing plea.{/lang-eng}
